title: Requirements Applying to Local Health Officials for Receiving State Aid for Tuberculosis Health Care Services
content:
Requirements Applying to Local Health Officials for Receiving State Aid for Tuberculosis Health Care Services

State Regulations
§ 43-1.11 - State aid for tuberculosis
§ 43-1.12 - Limitations on state aid
§ 43-1.13 - Audits by local health officials
§ 43-1.14 - Recovery

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
